shows.title: Planet Earth II
shows.description: Wildlife documentary series with David Attenborough, beginning with a look at the remote islands which offer sanctuary to some of the planet's rarest creatures, to the beauty of cities, which are home to humans, and animals.

shows.title: Band of Brothers
shows.description: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division, and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord, through V-J Day.
shows.writer: Erik Jendresen, Tom Hanks, John Orioff, E.Max Frye, Graham Yost, Bruce C. Mc.Kenna, Erik Bork
shows.stars: Scott Grimes, Damian Lewis, Ron Livingston, Donnie Wahlberg

shows.title: Chernobyl
shows.description: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.
shows.stars: Jessie Buckley, Jared Harris, Stellan Skarsgård

shows.title: The Wire
shows.description: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.
shows.stars: Dominic West, Lance Reddick, Sonja Sohn

shows.title: Blue Planet II
shows.description: David Attenborough returns to the world's oceans in this sequel to the acclaimed documentary filming rare and unusual creatures of the deep, as well as documenting the problems our oceans face.
shows.stars: David Attenborough, Peter Drost, Roger Horrocks

shows.title: Our Planet
shows.description: Documentary series focusing on the breadth of the diversity of habitats around the world, from the remote Arctic wilderness and mysterious deep oceans to the vast landscapes of Africa and diverse jungles of South America.

shows.title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
shows.description: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.
shows.stars: Neil deGrasse Tyson, Stoney Emshwiller, Piotr Michael

shows.title: Game of Thrones
shows.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
shows.stars: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington

shows.title: Sherlock
shows.description: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.
shows.stars: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Una Stubbs

shows.title: Loki
shows.description: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of “Avengers: Endgame.
shows.stars: Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson, Gugu Mbatha-Raw
